DOC.brief_summary: One of the first causes of irreversible blindness in mexican population is diabetic retinopathy which is clearly diferent between patients the time of evolution and development of retinopathy and complications. The aim of this study is to explore the inmunogenetic profile and the influence of HLA in this variations of the sickness to predict the severity of diabetic complications.
DOC.brief_title: HLA and it Relation With the Development of Proliferative Diabetic Retinopathy in Mexican Population
